{
  "structured": {

    },

    "education": [
      {
        "degree": "Bachelor's degree in Accounting",
        "institution": "Higher Institute for Administrative and Computer Sciences, New Cairo - Cairo",
        "year": 2023
      }
    ],
    "experience": [
      {
        "title": "Telesales Agent",
        "company": "Trend Trade Financial Consultation",
        "start_year": 2024,
        "end_year": 2024,
        "highlights": [
          "Conducted outbound sales calls to potential clients in the Saudi and American markets, promoting personalized financial consulting and investment services.",
          "Managed a high volume of daily calls, maintaining professional communication and building rapport with clients to understand their investment needs.",
          "Successfully communicated complex financial concepts in a simplified manner, aligning investment solutions with client goals.",
          "Worked closely with the sales team to ensure consistent follow-up on leads, leading to an increase in client acquisition and retention by 15%.",
          "Delivered exceptional customer service, addressing client inquiries promptly and maintaining regular contact to ensure satisfaction and long-term engagement.",
          "Collaborated with the investment analysis team to provide clients with accurate and up-to-date market trends, helping them make informed financial decisions."
        ]
      },
      {
        "title": "Customer Service Representative",
        "company": "Etisalat Misr",
        "start_year": 2021,
        "end_year": 2022,
        "highlights": [
          "Managed an average of 70-100 inbound calls per day, addressing customer inquiries, resolving billing issues, and providing technical support.",
          "Demonstrated excellent problem-solving skills, consistently resolving customer concerns in a timely and efficient manner, resulting in high customer satisfaction ratings.",
          "Provided detailed and accurate information to customers about services, billing, and technical solutions, ensuring clarity and a positive customer experience.",
          "Collaborated with team members to improve service delivery, sharing insights on customer pain points and contributing to process improvements.",
          "Received recognition for exceptional performance in customer satisfaction surveys and for achieving key performance metrics consistently.",
          "Handled customer inquiries, answered questions, and resolved problems in a timely manner."
        ]
      }
    ],
    "skills": [
      "Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)",
      "English (written and spoken)",
      "Accounting principles",
      "Recording accounting entries",
      "Analyzing numbers",
      "Preparing financial reports",
      "Communication",
      "Prioritization",
      "Time management",
      "Customer service",
      "Relationship building",
      "Problem solving",
      "Presentation skills",
      "Attention to detail",
      "Collaboration",
      "Leadership",
      "Delegation",
      "Coaching",
      "Mentoring"
    ],
    "tools": [
      "Microsoft Word",
      "Microsoft Excel",
      "Microsoft PowerPoint"
    ],
    "certifications": [
      {
        "name": "Student Data Management System (Student Affairs)",
        "issuer": "Vision academy",
        "year": 2023
      },
      {
        "name": "Web Design",
        "issuer": "Vision academy",
        "year": 2023
      }
    ],
    "languages": [
      "English"
    ],
    "projects": [
      {
        "name": "Student Data Management System",
        "description": "Graduation project; served as team leader for the project within ASA - Commerce Student Association.",
        "tech": []
      }
    ]
  },
  "analysis": {
    "score": 14,
    "score_breakdown": {
      "role_fit_and_core_skills": 0,
      "experience_impact": 2,
      "performance_productivity": 4,
      "retention_engagement_indicators": 2,
      "leadership_collaboration": 3,
      "education_certifications": 3,
      "projects_initiative": 0
    },
    "seniorityLevel": "unknown",
    "recommendation": "not_recommended",
    "insights": {
      "strengths": [
        "Demonstrated communication and customer-facing experience (high call volume; simplified complex concepts).",
        "Some measurable outcome shown (15% increase in client acquisition/retention).",
        "Leadership exposure via graduation project team leader role.",
        "Bachelor's degree in Accounting."
      ],
      "weaknesses": [
        "No explicit JavaScript or MERN stack experience listed (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js).",
        "No full-stack development experience or projects described; role requires 3+ years professional full-stack experience.",
        "No evidence of TypeScript, REST API design, testing tools (Jest/Cypress), CI/CD, Docker, or cloud deployments.",
        "Language requirement includes Arabic, but Arabic proficiency is not explicitly stated.",
        "Location preference is England/Europe; candidate location listed as Egypt."
      ]
    }
  },
  "ai_insights": {
    "matched_job_titles": [],
    "ai_thought": "The resume targets accounting/customer service and does not provide any explicit evidence of JavaScript or MERN full-stack development experience required for a senior fullstack MERN developer role. Strengths are in communication, customer service, and some leadership, but core technical requirements are missing.",
    "suggested_next_roles": [
      "Customer Service Representative",
      "Telesales Agent",
      "Junior Accountant",
      "Corporate Accountant (entry-level)"
    ]
  }
}

        "start_year": 2024,
        "end_year": 2024,
        "highlights": [
          "Manage reservation requests, changes, and cancellations through phone or mail",
          "Identify guest needs and recommend appropriate room types",
          "Verify room availability and provide information on rates, guarantees, and cancellation policies",
          "Document special requests and respond to inquiries about property facilities and accommodations",
          "Utilize sales techniques to maximize revenue opportunities",
          "Input and update reservation details, including special rates and codes, in the system",
          "Follow escalation procedures for addressing guest concerns"
        ]
      },
      {

        "end_year": 2023,
        "highlights": [

          "Managed accounts payable and receivable functions, ensuring timely payment processing and accurate record keeping",
          "Improved efficiency by developing Excel spreadsheets that automated various financial calculations and reports",
          "Received, reviewed, and verified the validity and completeness of receivables, accounting, and financial data",
          "Gained practical experience in various accounting functions and processes",
          "Developed a strong understanding of accounting principles and standards"
        ]
      },
      {
        "title": "Reservation Agent",
        "company": "Great Pyramid Inn & Royal Great Pyramid Inn (Sister Hotels) - Cairo, Egypt",
        "start_year": 2025,
        "end_year": "Present",
        "highlights": [
          "Managing guest reservations through hotel website, email, and phone to ensure smooth booking processes",
          "Following up with guests to finalize reservations and provide personalized assistance",
          "Handling cancellations, confirmations, and inquiries with efficiency and professionalism",
          "Monitoring and responding to guest reviews to maintain hotel reputation and guest satisfaction",
          "Accurately entering and updating all reservation details in the booking system",
          "Preparing and submitting weekly performance feedback reports to management"
        ]
      }
    ],
    "skills": [

  "analysis": {

    "score_breakdown": {

      "retention_engagement_indicators": 1,
      "leadership_collaboration": 1,
      "education_certifications": 4,
      "projects_initiative": 0
    },
    "seniorityLevel": "entry_level",
    "recommendation": "not_recommended",
    "insights": {
      "strengths": [
        "Fluent in English and Arabic (matches language requirement)",
        "Demonstrated customer service and communication experience in hospitality roles",
        "Exposure to operational processes and reporting (e.g., weekly feedback reports, record keeping)",
        "Business/management education background"
      ],
      "weaknesses": [
        "No evidence of JavaScript or MERN stack skills (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) required for the role",
        "No stated software engineering or full-stack development experience; 3+ years requirement not met in resume content",
        "No evidence of TypeScript, REST API development, testing tools (Jest/Cypress), CI/CD, Docker, or cloud platforms",
        "Location preference is England/Europe; candidate location listed as Giza, Egypt with no stated eligibility/relocation information",
        "No portfolio/GitHub/LinkedIn or technical projects provided"
      ]
    }
  },
  "ai_insights": {
    "matched_job_titles": [],
    "ai_thought": "The resume reflects hospitality and accounting trainee experience with strong communication and bilingual capability, but it contains no explicit full-stack/MERN or JavaScript development background required for a senior fullstack MERN developer role.",
    "suggested_next_roles": [
      "Guest Experience Agent",
      "Reservation Agent",
      "Customer Service Representative",
      "Front Office Agent",
      "Hospitality Operations Coordinator"
    ]
  }
}
